trans-unit.source: Receive alert notifications
trans-unit.target: Receive alert notifications

trans-unit.source: Be notified when alert rules conditions are met.
trans-unit.target: Be notified when alert rules conditions are met.

trans-unit.source: Receive alert notifications
trans-unit.target: Receive alert notifications

trans-unit.source: You can receive an alert based on monitoring metrics for, or events on, your Azure services.
trans-unit.target: You can receive an alert based on monitoring metrics for, or events on, your Azure services.

trans-unit.source: For an alert rule on a metric value, when the value of a specified metric crosses a threshold assigned, the alert rule becomes active and can send a notification.
trans-unit.target: For an alert rule on a metric value, when the value of a specified metric crosses a threshold assigned, the alert rule becomes active and can send a notification.

trans-unit.source: For an alert rule on events, a rule can send a notification on every event, or, only when a certain number of events happen.
trans-unit.target: For an alert rule on events, a rule can send a notification on every event, or, only when a certain number of events happen.

trans-unit.source: When you create an alert rule, you can select options to send an email notification to the service administrator and co-administrators or to another administrator that you can specify.
trans-unit.target: When you create an alert rule, you can select options to send an email notification to the service administrator and co-administrators or to another administrator that you can specify.

trans-unit.source: A notification email is sent when the rule becomes active, and when an alert condition is resolved.
trans-unit.target: A notification email is sent when the rule becomes active, and when an alert condition is resolved.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <link><linkText>REST API</linkText><title></title></link> or <link><linkText>.NET SDK</linkText><title></title></link> to configure and get information about alert rules programmatically.
trans-unit.target: You can use the <link><linkText>REST API</linkText><title></title></link> or <link><linkText>.NET SDK</linkText><title></title></link> to configure and get information about alert rules programmatically.

trans-unit.source: Create an alert rule
trans-unit.target: Create an alert rule

trans-unit.source: In the portal, click Browse, and then a resource you're interested in monitoring.
trans-unit.target: In the portal, click Browse, and then a resource you're interested in monitoring.

trans-unit.source: Click on the Alert rules tile in the Operations lens.
trans-unit.target: Click on the Alert rules tile in the Operations lens.

trans-unit.source: Click the Add alert command.
trans-unit.target: Click the Add alert command.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Add alert</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Add alert</linkText>

trans-unit.source: You can name your alert rule, and choose a description that will show up in the notification email.
trans-unit.target: You can name your alert rule, and choose a description that will show up in the notification email.

trans-unit.source: When you select Metrics you'll choose a condition and threshold Value for the metric.
trans-unit.target: When you select Metrics you'll choose a condition and threshold Value for the metric.

trans-unit.source: This is the period of time that Azure uses to monitor and plot alert activity.
trans-unit.target: This is the period of time that Azure uses to monitor and plot alert activity.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Condition and threshold</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Condition and threshold</linkText>

trans-unit.source: You can also choose Events, and get a notification when a certain event happens.
trans-unit.target: You can also choose Events, and get a notification when a certain event happens.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Events</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Events</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Finally, you can choose to send email notification to responsible administrators.
trans-unit.target: Finally, you can choose to send email notification to responsible administrators.

trans-unit.source: After you click Save, within a few minutes you will be informed whenever the metric you choose exceeds the threshold.
trans-unit.target: After you click Save, within a few minutes you will be informed whenever the metric you choose exceeds the threshold.

trans-unit.source: Managing your alert rules
trans-unit.target: Managing your alert rules

trans-unit.source: Once you have created an alert rule, you can view a preview of your alert threshold compared the metric from the previous day.
trans-unit.target: Once you have created an alert rule, you can view a preview of your alert threshold compared the metric from the previous day.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Events</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Events</linkText>

trans-unit.source: You can of course edit this alert rule, and Disable or Enable it if you want to temporarily stop receiving notifications about it.
trans-unit.target: You can of course edit this alert rule, and Disable or Enable it if you want to temporarily stop receiving notifications about it.

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Monitor service metrics</linkText><title></title></link> to make sure your service is available and responsive.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Monitor service metrics</linkText><title></title></link> to make sure your service is available and responsive.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Enable monitoring and diagnostics</linkText><title></title></link> to collect detailed high-frequency metrics on your service.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Enable monitoring and diagnostics</linkText><title></title></link> to collect detailed high-frequency metrics on your service.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Monitor availability and responsiveness of any web page</linkText><title></title></link> with Application Insights so you can find out if your page is down.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Monitor availability and responsiveness of any web page</linkText><title></title></link> with Application Insights so you can find out if your page is down.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Monitor application performance</linkText><title></title></link> if you want to understand exactly how your code is performing in the cloud.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Monitor application performance</linkText><title></title></link> if you want to understand exactly how your code is performing in the cloud.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>View events and audit logs</linkText><title></title></link> to learn everything that has happened in your service.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>View events and audit logs</linkText><title></title></link> to learn everything that has happened in your service.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Track service health</linkText><title></title></link> to find out when Azure has experienced performance degradation or service interruptions.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Track service health</linkText><title></title></link> to find out when Azure has experienced performance degradation or service interruptions.
